title: Great Sand Dunes National Park & Preserve: Work With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Work With Us            Work With Us         Research Assistant Julie Mao radio tracked elk at Great Sand Dunes during a three-year study. NPS/Fred Bunch  Great Sand Dunes hires for a wide variety of jobs. All seasonal and permanent posititions are posted on USAJobs.gov . You can set USAJobs to email you when positions open at the park. Best wishes on your job search!
